code: import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{selectCartItems}from'../../store/cart/cart.selector';import{addItemToCart}from'../../store/cart/cart.action';import Button,{BUTTON_TYPE_CLASSES}from'../button/button.component';import{ProductCartContainer,Footer,Name,Price}from'./product-card.styles';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductCard=function ProductCard(_ref){var product=_ref.product;var name=product.name,price=product.price,imageUrl=product.imageUrl;var dispatch=useDispatch();var cartItems=useSelector(selectCartItems);var addProductToCart=function addProductToCart(){return dispatch(addItemToCart(cartItems,product));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ProductCartContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:"".concat(name)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Footer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Name,{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Price,{children:price})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{buttonType:BUTTON_TYPE_CLASSES.inverted,onClick:addProductToCart,children:"Add to card"})]});};export default ProductCard;
